text: Jogitee ɓoggol Alla ngol on denndaangal, wata on sertu. Jaŋtoɗon Neema Alla on e dow mooɗon nde laatinoɗon ayruɓe, O Woowindiri hakkunde ɓerɗe mon ɗen woŋtirɗon Neema Makko on siɗɗuɓe; on laatioke e tonndu ngayka yiite, O Daɗndi on e magge. ko wano nii Alla Ɓannginiraŋta on Aayeeje Makko ɗen, bela jo'o, on feeway
